summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 10, 2019. It includes a count sheet, an inmate roster, and multiple official count slips, recording the inmate population and staff verification of counts. The forms are standard prison operational records.

persons.name: BULLOCK
persons.context: Listed as an inmate on the MCC roster with registration number 86409-054, assigned to housing unit E05, and marked with a suicide watch or unassigned status.

persons.name: SANTANA
persons.context: Listed as an inmate on the MCC roster with registration number 48816-066, assigned to housing unit K09, and marked with a suicide watch status.

persons.name: WALKER
persons.context: Listed as an inmate on the MCC roster with registration number 86900-054, assigned to housing unit E06, and marked with a suicide watch or unassigned status.

persons.name: WOOLASTON
persons.context: Listed as an inmate on the MCC roster with registration number 85369-054, assigned to housing unit K11, and marked with a suicide watch status and a work assignment in the warehouse.

events.title: Daily Inmate Count at MCC New York
events.description: Standard administrative inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, recording a total population of 758 inmates across various housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document records a routine inmate count at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 10, 2019.
The total inmate population recorded was 758 individuals across multiple housing units (e.g., B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B).
An inmate roster lists four specific inmates (BULLOCK, SANTANA, WALKER, WOOLASTON) with their registration numbers, housing assignments, and notations including 'SUICIDE WATCH'.
The forms are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative documents (Count Sheet, Inmate Roster, Official Count Slips) used for operational verification and record-keeping.
